cast.name: 安娜·马克哈泽 Ana Makharadze

writer.name: 鲁洛夫·扬·米尼勃 Roelof Jan Minneboo
乔治·奥瓦什威利 George Ovashvili

director.name: 乔治·奥瓦什威利 George Ovashvili

introduction: Helen is 25 years old. After finishing university, she comes back to her homeland from New York. The life was following its own route in her absence. Everything is foreign here for the returned Helen. Helen tries not only to find her place in Tbilisi - once a familiar environment for her - but also to find herself and find the keys that fit the locks of the main existential questions of life. Her encounter with film director Gabo is the start of an adventure that takes us into the minds and souls of a man and a woman, and old and a young soul. Their encounter is the start of a journey that encompasses more than just physical trip.
